Key Match Events: Shaheen Afridi removed both Andy Balbirnie and Lorcan Tucker in the first over
Shaheen Shah Afridi took three wickets earlier on
Mohammad Amir dismissed captain Paul Stirling
Imad Wasim took 3/8, removing Delany (caught by Shadab Khan), Mark Adair (caught by Afridi), and bowling Barry McCarthy outright
Abbas Afridi went for 17, again caught by the sub off White
Shaheen Afridi got the winnings runs, with 13 off just five deliveries
Pre-Game Insights: Naseem Shah was replaced by Abbas Afridi for Pakistan, while Ireland also made one change, bringing in Ben White for Craig Young
Post-Match Reflections: Babar Azam steered the ship home with an unbeaten 32
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan edged Ireland by three wickets in a tense cliffhanger in Florida
Batters make heavy weather of run-chase
Ireland made 106/9 off their 20 overs - despite being 15/4 at one stage
Pakistan got over the line thanks to the lofted strikes of Shaheen Shah Afridi
Others: The match was part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup, 2024
